justification: The vendor's Offering ('Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.') and Interfaces ('The pirate ship anchored off the coast of a deserted island.') provide no factual or technical information about federated learning, decentralized training, data privacy, security, or related capabilities required by the Ability. There is no evidence addressing the criterion.
ability: The ability to train an algorithm across multiple decentralized digital twin edge devices or servers holding local data samples, without exchanging their data samples.
